name: WebApiToOpenApiReflector
help: A dotnet tool that can use reflection to generate OpenApi from .NetFramework assemblies.

properties.name: AssemblyPaths
properties.help: The assembly or assemblies to process. (Required)

properties.name: ControllerNames
properties.help: Can optionally be used to limit the results to some controllers.

properties.name: DefaultUrlTemplate
properties.help: The Web API default URL template: (default for Web API: 'api/{controller}/{id}'; (default for MVC: '{controller}/{action}/{id?}'). (Default: api/{controller}/{id})

properties.name: AddMissingPathParameters
properties.help: If true, adds missing path parameters which are missing in the action method.

properties.name: DefaultResponseReferenceTypeNullHandling
properties.help: Specifies the default null handling for reference types when no nullability information is available. NotNull (default) or Null. (Default: Null) (Allowed values: Null, NotNull)

properties.name: GenerateOriginalParameterNames
properties.help: Generate x-originalName properties when parameter name is different in .NET and HTTP. (Default: True).

properties.name: Title
properties.help: Specifies the title of the Swagger specification, ignored when the document template is provided.

properties.name: Description
properties.help: Specifies the description of the Swagger specification, ignored when the document template is provided.

properties.name: Version
properties.help: Specifies the version of the Swagger specification (default: 1.0.0). (Default: 1.0.0)

properties.name: DocumentTemplate
properties.help: Specifies the Swagger document template (may be a path or JSON, default: none).
